info.title: Incoming VAT Invoice
info.description: The service is based on the *OData* protocol, and can be consumed by external systems and user interfaces to integrate with incoming VAT invoice management in SAP S/4HANA Cloud. You can create a complete China VAT invoice record including invoice header, item and binding record in one single call. You can also perform the following operations: declare, receive, and sign off the invoice.

x-sap-shortText: Create, update and read incoming VAT invoice data for China using this synchronous inbound service

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* China VAT Invoice - Management (I_CN_TAXINPUTINVCMNGTP)
* China VAT Invoice (I_CN_TAXINPUTINVCTP)
* Incoming VAT Invoice Item (I_CN_TAXINPUTINVOICEITEMTP)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

tags.name: China Input Tax Invoice Binding Record

get.summary: Gets the list of China input tax invoices.
get.description: Gets the list of China input tax invoices, including invoice code, number, net amount, and tax amount.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

post.summary: Creates a China input tax invoice.
post.description: Creates a new record of China input tax invoice by specifying the information such as invoice code, number, net amount, and tax amount.

parameters.name: CN_TaxInvcUUID
parameters.description: China Tax Invoice UUID

get.summary: Gets a single China input tax invoice with a UUID.
get.description: Gets a single record of China input tax invoice by specifying the UUID. You can get information such as invoice code, number, net amount, tax amount.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

parameters.name: CN_TaxInvcUUID
parameters.description: China Tax Invoice UUID

get.summary: Gets a single record of China input tax invoice and related binding information.
get.description: Gets a single record of China input tax invoice and related binding information. You can get information such as invoice code, number, net amount, tax amount and a list of binding document type and numbers.
tags: China Input Tax Invoice Binding Record

post.summary: Receives a China input tax invoice.
post.description: Receives a  China input tax invoice by specifying the UUID of China input tax invoice.

parameters.name: CN_TaxInvcUUID
parameters.description:
UUID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

post.summary: Signs off a China input tax invoice.
post.description: Signs off a China input tax invoice by specifying the UUID of China input tax invoice.

parameters.name: CN_TaxInvcUUID
parameters.description:
UUID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

post.summary: Declares a China input tax invoice.
post.description: Declares a China input tax invoice by specifying the UUID, declaration year, declaration month of China input tax invoice.

parameters.name: DeclnYear
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: DeclnMonth
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: CN_TaxInvcUUID
parameters.description:
UUID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_CN_TaxInputInvoice HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
